B C I M O S T U 

B

bestOption(int[], int[], int[], int) - Static method in class model.Operations
Method to calculate the best material prices
pre: The arrays received per parameter must be declared and initialized
pre: Every array have to be of integers
pre: The integers inside of every array have to be the price of materials for each store
post: The array best_prices must be declared and initialized
post: returns an array of integers with the best prices of materials

C

CategoryConstruction(int, String[], int[], int) - Static method in class model.Operations
Method that creates an array where save the materials that belong to selection of user2
pre: The arrays and variables received per parameter must be declared and initialized
pre: Selection have to be a number between 1 and 3
post: Is necessary declare an array of string type for save the names of materials that belong to user selection
post: Returns an array with the materials that belong to selection of user
categoryList(Scanner, String[], int[], int) - Static method in class ui.Integrative
Method that deploy a list with the material for the caterogy that the user selects
pre: Scanner sc must be initialized
pre: All the array received per parameter must be declared and initialized wit the corresponding data type
pre: The integer selection must be a number between 1 and 3
post: This method does not return anything
post: Is necessary declare a
count(int[], int) - Static method in class model.Operations
Method that counts the numbers that belong to the user selection
pre: The arrays and variables received per parameter must be declared and initialized
pre: The integer selection have to be a number between 1 and 3
post: Is necessary declare and initialize a variable count
post: Returns a integer with the amount of numbers that belong to user selection, example amount of numbers one in the array utilization

I

Integrative - Class in ui
 
Integrative() - Constructor for class ui.Integrative
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ui.Integrative
Method main to declare the arrays and fill them
pre: The methods used in this method must be created and have correct operation
pre: The scanner sc must be iniatialized
pre: The arrays name_material, amount_material, utililzation, homecenter, local_store and hub_store must be declared and initialilzed
pre: The variable amount have to be an integer
pre: The variable selection have to be an integer
pre: The variable location have to be an string
pre: The data entered in the name_material array must be only words
pre: The integer introduced in the array utilization have to be only 1,2 o 3
model - package model
 

O

Operations - Class in model
 
Operations() - Constructor for class model.Operations
 

S

showData(int[], int[], int[], String[], int, String, int[]) - Static method in class ui.Integrative
Method that shows to the user the data about materials after the relevant calculations
pre: The arrays received per parameter must be declared and initialized
pre: For every array the data inside of they must be of corresponding type
pre: The array location have to be only the words requested from the user by a message of console
post: Is necessary declare and initialize a new array where save the best prices for after use them in other method
post: Is necessary declare and initialize a variable of integer type where save the total of the best prices for after use that total in other method
post: This method does not return anything
stores(int[], int[], int[], int[], int) - Static method in class model.Operations
Method that defines which store the best prices belong to
pre: The arrays received per parameter must be declared and initialized
pre: Every array have to be of integers
pre: The integers inside of every array have to be the price of materials for each store
post: The array best_prices must be declared and initialized
post: returns an array of integers with the best prices of materials

T

total(int[]) - Static method in class model.Operations
Method to calculate the total material prices
pre: The array matererial_prices must be declared and initialized
pre: The array material_prices have to be an array of integers
pre: The integers inside of array have to be the price of each material
post: The variable total must be declared and initialized
post: returns an integer with the total price of materials
transport(int, String) - Static method in class model.Operations
Method that defines the price of transport of materials for each ubication depending on the total of the account
pre: The arrays received per parameter must be declared and initialized
pre: The integer total have to be the total price of materials without labor
pre: The array location have to be only the words requested from the user by a message of console
post: The variable price_transport must be declared and initialized
post: returns an integer with the price of transport of materials
